QPushButton_acquiring: QPushButton {color: white; background-color: red; font: bold 20px; padding: 6px; border-radius: 10px; min-width: 180px}
QPushButton_irradiationModeOn: QPushButton {color: black; background-color: yellow; font: bold 20px; padding: 6px; border-radius: 10px; min-width: 180px}  QPushButton:hover {color: red}
QPushButton_idle: QPushButton {color: white; background-color: blue; font: bold 20px; padding: 6px; border-radius: 10px; min-width: 180px} QPushButton:hover {color: yellow}
QPushButton_disable: QPushButton {color: white; background-color: gray; font: bold 20px; padding: 6px; border-radius: 10px; min-width: 180px} QPushButton:hover {color: yellow}
QPushButton_simulation: QPushButton {color: white; background-color: black; font: bold 20px; padding: 6px; border-radius: 10px; min-width: 30px} QPushButton:hover {color: yellow}
QPushButton_icon: QPushButton {color: grey; border-top: 3px transparent; border-bottom: 3px transparent; border-right: 10px transparent; border-left: 10px transparent;}
QPushButton_warmup1: QPushButton {color: grey; border-top: 3px transparent; border-bottom: 3px transparent; border-right: 10px transparent; border-left: 10px transparent; background-image: url("/home/htsirradiation/Documents/hts-irradiation-gui/images/warmup.png");} QPushButton:hover {color: grey; border-top: 3px transparent; border-bottom: 3px transparent; border-right: 10px transparent; border-left: 10px transparent; background-image: url("/home/htsirradiation/Documents/hts-irradiation-gui/images/warmup-hover.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat;}
QPushButton_warmup: QPushButton {color: grey; border-top: 3px transparent; border-bottom: 3px transparent; border-right: 10px transparent; border-left: 10px transparent; background-image: url("/home/htsirradiation/Documents/hts-irradiation-gui/images/warmup-idle.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat; width: 120px; height: 120px} QPushButton:hover {color: grey; border-top: 3px transparent; border-bottom: 3px transparent; border-right: 10px transparent; border-left: 10px transparent; background-image: url("/home/htsirradiation/Documents/hts-irradiation-gui/images/warmup-hover.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat;}
